Please join us at Blue Ridge Community College on Nov. 8 to discuss civil rights issues.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We know you care about civil rights issues, and we want to know what issues are most important to you and people in the Shenandoah Valley.

Join us for our fifth and final 2018 Member Forum in your area! We'll be focusing on prosecutorial reform and voting rights, as well as answering your questions and letting you know how to stay involved with the ACLU of Virginia and be an advocate in the Valley.

Member Forum: Shenandoah Valley

Join us to discuss the civil rights issues that are most important to you and what you can do right now to fight for these causes at the local, state and federal levels.

Thursday, November 8, 7 - 8:30 p.m.
Blue Ridge Community College
Room G186-188
1 College Ln
Weyers Cave, VA 24486

RSVP TODAY

The event is free and open to the public. Members and non-members are welcome to attend. Register today to secure your spot and receive detailed directions.

See you soon,

ACLU of Virginia
